title: Variables
summary: Variables store values so you can reuse them later in your program. You assign a value to a variable and then use the variable name whenever you need that value.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful?

title: Loops
summary: Loops let you repeat an action multiple times. A for loop repeats for a fixed number of steps, while a while loop keeps running until a condition becomes false.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.
